name: Life Sciences (SV)
target_audience: Students aiming for university programs in medicine, pharmacy, biology, etc.
skillsDeveloped: Gain deep understanding of fundamental biological concepts
Develop strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Prepare for Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (SV section) and university entrance exams
content_structure: Video lectures by experienced biology teachers
Detailed study guides and revision materials
Access to relevant scientific articles and research papers
key_features: Focus on exam preparation aligned with latest curriculum
Different type of resources available for each path
call_to_action: Become a future life science expert!

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Valuable for understanding complex biological concepts.

reviews.name: David A.
reviews.review: Knowledgeable and passionate teachers make learning enjoyable.

description: The Life Sciences (SV) path provides a comprehensive foundation in fundamental biological concepts. Through engaging video lectures by experienced biology teachers, interactive quizzes and practice exams, detailed study guides, and access to relevant scientific articles, you will gain a deep understanding of essential topics like cell biology, genetics, evolution, ecology, and human anatomy and physiology. This path emphasizes exam preparation, ensuring you are well-equipped for the Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (SV section) and university entrance exams.

name: General Sciences (SG)
target_audience: Students aiming for university programs in engineering, physics, etc.
skillsDeveloped: Develop solid understanding of physics, chemistry, and mathematics
Prepare for Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (SG section) and university entrance exams
content_structure: Engaging video lectures covering physics, chemistry, and mathematics
Interactive exercises and practice exams with solutions
Detailed study guides and revision materials
Access to supplementary resources like simulations and experiments
key_features: Preparation for diverse fields with a strong science foundation
call_to_action: Build a strong foundation for your scientific career!

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Helped solidify understanding of physics and chemistry for engineering programs.

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Practice exams sessions similar to actual Baccalaureate exams

description: The General Sciences (SG) path equips you with a solid understanding of the core scientific principles in physics, chemistry, and mathematics. Engaging video lectures delivered by experienced instructors, interactive exercises and practice exams with solutions, detailed study guides, and access to supplementary resources like simulations and experiments will help you master these fundamental concepts. This path focuses on building a strong science foundation, preparing you for diverse university programs and future careers in various scientific fields.

name: Sociology and Economics (SE)
target_audience: Students interested in university programs in economics, business, law, etc.
skillsDeveloped: Gain comprehensive understanding of core concepts in sociology and economics
Develop critical thinking and analytical skills
Prepare for Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (SE section) and university entrance exams
content_structure: Informative video lectures on key sociological and economic topics
Interactive exercises and assignments applying concepts to real-world scenarios
Comprehensive study guides and revision materials
Access to relevant news articles and case studies
key_features: Real-world application connecting theory to current events
Development of critical thinking skills through objective analysis
Preparation for diverse fields in social sciences and business
call_to_action: Explore the fascinating world of social and economic interactions!

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Deeper understanding of social and economic factors shaping our world.

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Interactive exercises and discussions valuable for developing critical thinking skills.

description: The Sociology and Economics (SE) path delves into the fascinating world of social and economic interactions. Informative video lectures on key topics, interactive exercises and assignments applying concepts to real-world scenarios, comprehensive study guides, and relevant news articles and case studies will equip you with a comprehensive understanding of core concepts in sociology and economics. This path develops your critical thinking and analytical skills, enabling you to interpret and evaluate social and economic phenomena objectively and prepare effectively for the Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (SE section) and university entrance exams.

name: Humanities and Literature (LH)
target_audience: Students interested in university programs in literature, history, law, etc.
learning_outcomes: Develop deep understanding of literary works and historical periods
Strengthen critical reading, writing, and communication skills
Prepare for Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (LH section) and university entrance exams
content_structure: Video lectures on literature, history, and philosophy
Interactive activities and assignments for text analysis
Detailed study guides and revision materials
Access to literary works, historical documents, and philosophical writings
skillsDeveloped: Explore diverse themes and perspectives in humanities
Develop communication skills through writing and critical thinking
Prepare for humanities-based careers with a strong foundation
call_to_action: Immerse yourself in the world of humanities and literature!

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Instrumental in developing critical thinking and appreciation for literature.

reviews.name: Sarah B.
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and interactive activities make learning history enjoyable.

description: The Humanities and Literature (LH) path immerses you in the rich tapestry of human expression and historical events. In-depth video lectures from passionate instructors, interactive activities and assignments analyzing and interpreting texts, detailed study guides, and access to various literary works, historical documents, and philosophical writings will deepen your understanding of diverse themes and perspectives in literature, history, and philosophy. This path helps you develop strong critical reading, writing, and communication skills, preparing you for the Lebanese Baccalaureate exams (LH section) and university programs in humanities-based
